common.availableToOrderNote: Šī produkta piegāde var aizņemt vairākas nedēļas.

header.promoAccount: Izveidojiet kontu, lai izsekotu un piekļūtu saviem pasūtījumiem jebkurā laikā
header.promoB2B: Atveriet B2B kontu apjoma cenām un labākām atlaidēm

footer.companyDesc: Jūsu partneris profesionāliem saules optimizācijas risinājumiem visā Eiropā.
footer.operatedBy: Uztur: Initra Energija d.o.o. - Pilnvarots Tigo Energy izplatītājs
footer.disclaimer1: Piegāde ir atkarīga no trešo pušu pakalpojumu sniedzējiem, un mums nav kontroles pār piegādes laikiem vai kavējumiem.
footer.disclaimer2: Ražotāja garantija attiecas uz MLPE ierīcēm.
footer.disclaimer3: Bezrūpīga atgriešana attiecas uz B2C klientiem personiskai lietošanai 14 dienu laikā. Pircējs ir atbildīgs par atgriešanas piegādes izmaksām.

products.noProductsCategory: Šajā kategorijā vēl nav pieejamu produktu.
products.noProductsSearch: Neviens produkts neatbilst "{search}". Mēģiniet citu meklēšanas frāzi.

cart.cartEmptyDesc: Izskatās, ka vēl neesat neko pievienojis.
cart.saveCartDesc: Dodiet grozam nosaukumu (piemēram, PO numurs, projekta nosaukums), lai to vēlāk viegli atjaunotu.
cart.b2bPricingDesc: Rādītās cenas neietver PVN. PVN tiks aprēķināts pie apmaksas, pamatojoties uz jūsu uzņēmuma atrašanās vietu un PVN numuru.
cart.priceIncludesVatDesc: Visās rādītajās cenās ir iekļauts {rate}% PVN. Piegādes izmaksas tiks pievienotas pie apmaksas.

checkout.warrantyReturnInfo: Es saprotu, ka tiek piemērota 1 gada garantija un 14 dienu atgriešanas politika.
checkout.newsletterSubscribe: Abonējiet mūsu jaunumu vēstuli, lai saņemtu saules enerģijas jaunumus un ekskluzīvus piedāvājumus.
checkout.b2bNote: B2B pasūtījums: Rādītas neto cenas. Var tikt piemērota PVN reversā maksāšana.
checkout.requiredFieldsDesc: Lauki, kas atzīmēti ar sarkanu apmali, ir obligāti.
checkout.noShippingMethods: Jūsu izvēlei nav pieejamu piegādes veidu.

home.heroTitle: Specializēts tiešsaistes veikals Tigo Energy produktiem
home.heroSubtitle: Bez uzcenojumiem. Bez pārsteigumiem. Tikai tieša piekļuve.
home.heroServing: Apkalpo visu saules enerģijas kopienu: uzstādītājus, mazumtirgotājus un māju īpašniekus.
home.noProductsYet: Produkti vēl nav pieejami. Pievienojiet produktus administratora panelī.
home.shopByCategorySubtitle: Atrodiet pareizos produktus savam saules enerģijas projektam
home.logisticsP1: No mūsu stratēģiskā centra Slovenia mēs savienojam ražošanas izcilību no Taizemes un Ķīnas tieši pie jūsu durvīm. Preces ierodas caur Koper ostu — īsākais maršruts no Āzijas uz Centrāleiropu.
home.logisticsP2: Šī loģistikas priekšrocība samazina tranzīta laikus un novērš nevajadzīgus starpniekus. Rezultāts? Mēs varam izplatīt Tigo Energy produktus jebkur EU par zemāko iespējamo cenu.
home.mapAlt: Tigo Energy EU izplatīšanas karte - Slovenia centrs
home.whyChooseSubtitle: Mēs padarām saules optimizāciju vienkāršu un pieejamu
home.moreEnergyDesc: Moduļa līmeņa optimizācija nodrošina maksimālu enerģijas iegūšanu no katra paneļa, pat daļējā ēnā.
home.enhancedSafetyDesc: Ātrās izslēgšanas atbilstība un moduļa līmeņa uzraudzība drošībai.
home.smartMonitoringDesc: Reāllaika veiktspējas dati katram modulim ar Tigo Energy Intelligence platformu.
home.ctaSubtitle: Pievienojieties tūkstošiem uzstādītāju un māju īpašnieku, kas uzticas Tigo savām saules optimizācijas vajadzībām.

invoice.returnPolicy: Atgriešanas politika: Mēs piedāvājam 14 dienu atgriešanas politiku visām neizmantotām precēm to oriģinālajā iepakojumā. Lūdzu, sazinieties ar support@tigoenergy.com atgriešanas autorizācijai.
invoice.warranty: Garantija: Visi šajā rēķinā uzskaitītie produkti ir segti ar 1 gada standarta ierobežoto garantiju, sākot no piegādes datuma.
invoice.legalAgreement: Juridisks līgums: Klients elektroniski piekrita noteikumiem un nosacījumiem: {date}.
invoice.thankYou: Paldies, ka izvēlējāties Tigo Energy. Ilgtspēja ir mūsu misija.

verificationCode.title: Verify your email address
verificationCode.text: Thank you for joining Tigo Energy SHOP. To complete your registration and secure your account, please use the following verification code:
verificationCode.expire: This code will expire in 10 minutes. If you did not request this, please ignore this email.

verificationLink.title: Verify your email address
verificationLink.text: Welcome to Tigo Energy SHOP! Please click the button below to verify your email address and activate your account.
verificationLink.linkHelp: If the button above doesn't work, you can also copy and paste the following link into your browser:
verificationLink.ignore: If you did not create an account, no further action is required.

welcome.title: Welcome to the family!
welcome.text: We're thrilled to have you at Tigo Energy SHOP. You're now connected to Europe's specialized distributor for Tigo Energy solar solutions.
welcome.feature1Desc: Direct access to technical experts who know Tigo products inside out.
welcome.feature2Desc: Genuine products at the best possible prices, shipped directly across Europe.
welcome.feature3Desc: Manage your orders, tracking, and B2B benefits all from one profile.
welcome.footerNote: If you have any questions, our support team is just one message away.

messageSent.title: We've received your inquiry
messageSent.text: Thank you for reaching out to us. Your message has been successfully delivered to our support team. We've included a copy of your message below for your records.
messageSent.footerNote: A member of our team will review your inquiry and get back to you as soon as possible. We typically respond within one business day.

newMessage.title: You have a new message
newMessage.text: A team member has replied to your inquiry. You can view the message and continue the conversation in your store profile.
newMessage.footerNote: If you have any trouble logging in, please contact our support team.

orderConfirmation.title: Thanks for your order!
orderConfirmation.text: We've received your order and we're getting it ready. You'll receive another email when your order has been shipped.
orderConfirmation.footerNote: You can track your order status in your Account Profile.

orderPartial.title: Order Received
orderPartial.bannerText: Your order has been successfully received and partially paid. Because of the nature or size of your order, we are currently calculating the most accurate shipping cost for your location.
orderPartial.text: We will notify you via email as soon as the shipping price is set. Once confirmed, you will be able to fulfill the final payment in your store profile to complete the order.
orderPartial.footerNote: Thank you for your patience and for choosing Tigo Energy SHOP.

cartAbandonment.title: Did you forget something?
cartAbandonment.text: We noticed you left some items in your cart. We've saved them for you, so you can pick up exactly where you left off.
cartAbandonment.footerNote: Need help with your order? Just reply to this email and our team will be happy to assist you.

priceChange.title: Exciting price update!
priceChange.text: We thought you'd like to know that a product you previously purchased or showed interest in now has a new price.
priceChange.footerNote: This is a great time to expand your solar installation or stock up on components.

delivered.title: Delivered!
delivered.text: Great news! Your order #{{order_number}} has been successfully delivered. We hope you are happy with your new Tigo Energy products.
delivered.attachmentNote: For your records, we have attached the following documents to this email:
delivered.footerNote: Thank you for choosing Initra Energija as your Tigo Energy partner. If you have any questions about installation or product setup, our technical team is here to help.

b2bVerified.title: Your B2B Account is Active
b2bVerified.text: We are pleased to inform you that your VAT number (VIES) has been successfully verified. Your B2B account is now fully active, and you can enjoy all the benefits of our professional partner program.
b2bVerified.button: Log In to Your B2B Portal
b2bVerified.footerNote: Welcome aboard! We look forward to supporting your solar projects.

b2bApplication.title: B2B Application Received
b2bApplication.bannerText: Our team is currently reviewing your documentation and company information. This process typically takes up to 48 hours.
b2bApplication.text: Once your information is verified, we will notify you via email and your account will be fully operational with access to B2B pricing and professional tools.
b2bApplication.footerNote: In the meantime, if you have any urgent questions, feel free to reply to this email.

passwordReset.title: Reset your password
passwordReset.text: We received a request to reset your password for your Tigo Energy SHOP account. Please click the button below to choose a new password.
passwordReset.linkHelp: If the button above doesn't work, you can also copy and paste the following link into your browser:
passwordReset.expire: This link will expire in 1 hour. If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email or contact support if you have concerns.

shippingUpdate.title: Your order is on the way!
shippingUpdate.text: Your order #{{order_number}} has been shipped and is now on its way to you.
shippingUpdate.footerNote: Please note that it may take up to 24 hours for the tracking information to update on the carrier's website.
